Entries.262213001/e 262213000/A AdvAbiDelay1/f A: continue/53 8/farmer 48 7 1 Abigail 54 7 0/addConversationTopic AdvAbiDelay2 3/skippable/fade/pause 400/move farmer 4 0 1 true/emote Abigail 40/emote farmer 8/jump Abigail/faceDirection Abigail 3/pause 200/speak Abigail "@!"/pause 200/emote farmer 32/pause 200/emote farmer 8/pause 200/emote Abigail 40/pause 300/faceDirection Abigail 0/pause 300/speak Abigail "What's it like down there?$2"/pause 300/question fork0 "#There's a lot of monsters to fight.#There's a lot of treasure to find."/pause 200/speak Abigail "Sounds like fun."/pause 400/speak Abigail "But it's pretty dangerous, right?$2#$b#I've heard stories of people getting lost down there.$2#$b#Or trapped.$2#$b#Or... worse.$2"/pause 200/emote farmer 40/pause 200/faceDirection Abigail 3/speak Abigail "It sounds like the kind of thing someone would only do if they didn't have a choice.$2#$b#So why do you go down there?"/pause 200/quickQuestion Why do you go into the mines?#I want to protect the valley.#I need materials for my farm.#I have to get stronger.#I like killing monsters.#I'm looking for treasure to sell.(break)speak Abigail "That's a noble goal.#$b#I'm grateful you're keeping the valley safe."(break)speak Abigail "I guess that makes sense.#$b#Farming must need a lot of resources."(break)speak Abigail "Huh, between that and farming I would think you're already pretty strong.#$b#I guess the training never ends huh?"(break)speak Abigail "Wow, they must be pretty scared of you by now.#$b#Is there a lot of blood involved?#$b#Wait - don't answer that!$7"(break)speak Abigail "You must be pretty rich by now.#$b#So that's where you keep getting those amethysts from!$1"/pause 300/emote Abigail 40/pause 200/speak Abigail "I've always wanted to go on adventures.#$b#To fight monsters, and save people...$2#$b#To prove myself, you know?#$b#My parents told me to get my head out of the clouds.$2#$b#They said I'd get hurt, and we're already safe, so I shouldn't go looking for trouble.$2#$b#I mean, they're not wrong."/pause 200/faceDirection Abigail 0/emote Abigail 40/pause 200/speak Abigail "But it's pretty cool that you get to do those things.#$b#I guess I'm just not cut out for that."/pause 200/question fork1 "#Why not? You should go for it!#I think you can do it if you set your mind to it.#It's up to you.#It's not for everyone.#Yeah, I don't think you'd be very good at it."/pause 300/emote Abigail 40/pause 200/speak Abigail "You know what? I'll think about it.#$b#Thanks for talking with me @."/pause 200/emote farmer 32/pause 400/end/fade

Entries.262213002/e 262213001/A AdvAbiDelay2/f A: continue/26 25/farmer 15 31 0 Abigail 26 24 0/skippable/fade/pause 400/speak Abigail "I'm going to do it!$1"/pause 200/emote farmer 8/pause 200/speak Abigail "I've decided to become an adventurer."/pause 200/emote farmer 16/pause 200/speak Abigail "You inspired me, in fact.#$b#You came all the way out here from the city to follow your dreams.#$b#You weren't even good at it back then.#$b#But you kept doing it, and you've made a name for yourself.#$b#Not just in farming and adventuring, but things like fishing and building stuff too.#$b#When you find something you're passionate about, you don't let anything stop you.#$b#If you can do that, so can I!"/pause 200/emote farmer 60/pause 200/emote farmer 20/pause 200/speak Abigail "Alright, time to get started!#$b#Can you help me train?"/pause 300/emote farmer 40/pause 200/emote farmer 16/pause 200/emote farmer 40/pause 200/speak Abigail "There's a guild of adventurers?#$b#Right here in the valley?#$b#That's perfect!#$b#Can you introduce me to them?"/pause 300/emote farmer 32/pause 200/jump Abigail/pause 200/speak Abigail "Thanks so much @!#$b#I'm ready whenever you are.#$b#I can't wait!#$b#I'm going to be an adventurer!$1"/pause 200/emote farmer 32/pause 300/end/fade

Entries.262213003/e 262213002/f Abigail 2000: continue/7 13/farmer 4 16 0 Abigail 6 16 0 Marlon 5 13 2/addConversationTopic AdvAbiDelay3 8/addConversationTopic AdvAbi_M_Start 4/skippable/fade/pause 300/speak Marlon "You want to join the Adventurer's Guild?"/pause 200/speak Abigail "Yes!#$b#It's always been my dream to be an adventurer.#$b#To explore new places and keep people safe.#$b#I even started practicing with this old sword I found!"/pause 200/textAboveHead Marlon "Hmm..."/pause 200/speak Marlon "What do you think, @?"/pause 200/quickQuestion What do you think?#She'll need a lot of training.#I think she has potential.#I trust her to have my back.(break)speak Marlon "Indeed.#$b#Handling a weapon takes a great deal of preparation.#$b#Both physical and mental."(break)speak Marlon "A passionate spark will only carry you so far.#$b#You must be ready to put in the work."(break)speak Marlon "Oh?#$b#It is important for your allies to have faith in your abilities.#$b#Even more important, however, is having the skills and experience to not let them down."/pause 200/speak Marlon "The path of an adventurer is not an easy one.#$b#For every joy, there will be sorrow.#$b#For every triumph, there will be disaster.#$b#And for every gain, there will be loss.#$b#Do you understand?"/pause 500/speak Abigail "I understand."/pause 300/emote Abigail 40/pause 300/speak Abigail "I am ready for this."/pause 200/emote Marlon 40/pause 200/speak Marlon "We'll see about that."/pause 200/emote Abigail 32/pause 200/speak Marlon "Let's start by getting you a proper sword..."/pause 300/end/fade

Abigail/pause 100/faceDirection Abigail 0/pause 200/speak Abigail "Wh-who's there?$2"/pause 200/move farmer 0 3 1 true/playSound leafrustle/pause 200/playSound leafrustle/shake Abigail 100/playSound leafrustle/faceDirection Abigail 3/pause 200/emote Abigail 16/pause 200/speak Abigail "@!"/pause 200/emote farmer 32/pause 200/speak Abigail "You startled me!$1#$b#...But I'm fine.$2"/pause 200/quickQuestion What are you doing out here?#Foraging.#Buying a hat from a mouse.#You first.(break)speak Abigail "Must be some good pickings to be out so late."(break)speak Abigail "Very funny.$1"(break)speak Abigail "Alright, so basically-"/pause 100/playSound leafrustle/pause 50/playSound batFlap/pause 100/jump Abigail/pause 100/faceDirection Abigail 0/pause 100/faceDirection Abigail 1/pause 100/faceDirection Abigail 2/pause 100/emote Abigail 28/pause 200/emote farmer 8/pause 200/faceDirection Abigail 3/pause 200/speak Abigail "Marlon taught me orienteering this morning.#$b#...Then he told me to find my way back to town on my own.$2#$b#...I'm still working on that.$2"/pause 200/quickQuestion #So you're lost?#He left you all alone?(break)speak Abigail "I'm not lost!$5#$b#I'm just taking my time.$3"(break)speak Abigail "What, you think I can't handle it?$5#$b#I'm doing just fine.$3"/pause 200/emote farmer 40/pause 200/speak Abigail "And besides, I've got this flare he showed me how to use.#$b#Just in case."/pause 200/emote farmer 20/pause 200/speak Abigail "Anyway, you can go now.#$b#I can take it from here."/pause 200/emote farmer 32/pause 200/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 200/move farmer 0 -2 0/faceDirection Abigail 0/textAboveHead Abigail "Just!"/pause 200/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 100/emote farmer 8/pause 400/emote Abigail 40/pause 200/emote Abigail 28/pause 200/speak Abigail "Could you, uh...$2#$b#Point which way is north, please?$3#$b#To make things quicker!$5"/pause 200/emote farmer 56/pause 200/speak Abigail "...Thanks.$3"/pause 200/emote farmer 32/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 100/move farmer 0 -4 0 true/faceDirection Abigail 2/emote Abigail 40/pause 100/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp farmer 94 75/faceDirection farmer 0/viewport 87 72/fade/pause 200/move farmer 0 -2 0/pause 200/emote farmer 16/pause 200/emote Marlon 56/pause 200/speak Marlon "Good evening @."/pause 200/emote farmer 8/pause 200/speak Marlon "You didn't honestly believe I'd leave Abigail out here completely on her own?#$b#Not this early in her training at least."/pause 200/emote farmer 32/pause 200/speak Marlon "Don't worry, she is in no danger.#$b#I'll step in if anything happens...#$b#But I find the true value of this exercise to be the self-determination gained from making her own way through the forest.#$b#It was one of the best things I learned from my own mentor, many years ago.#$b#Granted, rather than a nearby forest, I was left at the top of a mountain on another continent."/pause 200/emote farmer 16/pause 200/speak Marlon "No, I'm not going to do that."/pause 200/emote Marlon 40/pause 200/speak Marlon "Well, not yet at least."/pause 200/emote farmer 28/pause 200/speak Marlon "In any case, it's quite late.#$b#You'd better get going."/pause 200/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 200/emote farmer 40/pause 200/speak Marlon "Don't worry.#$b#She will be alright."/pause 200/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 200/speak Marlon "You have my word."/pause 200/emote farmer 32/pause 300/end/fade

Entries.262213013/e 262213012/f Abigail 2000: continue/7 13/farmer 4 16 0 Abigail 6 16 0 Marlon 5 13 2/skippable/fade/pause 400/speak Marlon "Rope?"/pause 200/speak Abigail "Check!"/pause 200/speak Marlon "Knife?"/pause 200/speak Abigail "Check!"/pause 200/speak Marlon "Water?"/pause 200/speak Abigail "Check!"/pause 200/speak Marlon "Rations?"/pause 200/speak Abigail "Check!"/pause 200/speak Marlon "First aid kit?"/pause 200/speak Abigail "Check!"/pause 200/speak Marlon "Sword?"/pause 200/speak Abigail "Check!"/pause 200/emote Marlon 40/pause 200/speak Marlon "Have I missed anything @?"/pause 200/quickQuestion #I think you've covered it all.#Excitement!(break)speak Marlon "Good."(break)speak Abigail "Check!$1"/pause 200/speak Marlon "And I know you're experienced at this, but do you also have everything you need @?"/pause 200/emote farmer 32/pause 200/speak Marlon "Alright.#$b#Remember, we will be entering a dangerous environment.#$b#Abigail, @ and myself will protect you from anything we might encounter.#$b#However you must still remain cautious at all times.#$b#If there is an emergency, exit the mines immediately.#$b#Do not attempt to fight unless you have absolutely no other option.#$b#Do you understand?"/pause 200/speak Abigail "Understood.$6"/pause 200/speak Marlon "Alright, let's be off."/pause 200/faceDirection Abigail 3/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 200/speak Abigail "This is going to be so cool!$1"/pause 200/emote farmer 32/pause 300/end/fade

Entries.262213014/e 262213013/f Abigail 2000: Cavern/-1000 -1000/farmer -100 -100 2 Abigail -100 -100 2 Marlon -100 -100 2/skippable/changeToTemporaryMap Custom_Si_AA_Map1/viewport 15 5/fade/pause 400/playSound stairsdown/warp Marlon 14 5/pause 400/playSound stairsdown/warp farmer 16 5/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 400/playSound stairsdown/warp Abigail 15 5/faceDirection Abigail 2/pause 400/faceDirection Abigail 3/pause 200/faceDirection Abigail 2/pause 200/faceDirection Abigail 1/pause 200/faceDirection Abigail 2/pause 200/speak Abigail "Woah.#$b#So this is what the mines look like?"/pause 200/speak Marlon "At the upper levels, yes.#$b#As we descend further, they start to change.#$b#@, what type of caverns do you find yourself exploring the most?"/pause 200/quickQuestion What levels do you travel to often?#Ice caverns#Lava caverns#Regular caverns#Skull caverns#Volcanoes#Actually, I don't come down here too often(break)speak Abigail "Those must be pretty cool."(break)speak Abigail "Wow, like, actual lava?#$b#Awesome!$1"(break)speak Abigail "Huh, you must be pretty familiar with these levels then."(break)speak Marlon "Those can be found in the desert.#$b#They are very advanced, so we'll save them for when you are much further along in your training."(break)speak Abigail "WOW, there are volcanoes around here?$7"\speak Marlon "There are a few on the islands nearby."(break)speak Abigail "Huh, I wouldn't have guessed."/pause 200/emote farmer 56/pause 200/speak Marlon "Alright, let's get started."/pause 200/playSound slime/pause 200/playSound slime/pause 100/playSound slime/jump Abigail/speak Abigail "What was that?$7"/pause 200/speak Marlon "There's likely a slime nest nearby.#$b#Proceed with caution."/pause 200/emote Abigail 28/pause 200/speak Abigail "R-right...$2"/pause 200/move Abigail 0 1 2/pause 100/shake Abigail 200/pause 100/move Abigail 0 1 2/pause 100/shake Abigail 200/pause 100/move Abigail 0 1 2/playSound batScreech/jump Abigail/speak Abigail "AH!$7"/speed Abigail 4/move Abigail 0 -3 0/warp Abigail -100 -100/playSound stairsdown/faceDirection farmer 3/emote farmer 40/pause 200/emote Marlon 40/pause 200/speak Marlon "Hmm...#$b#Perhaps it was too soon."/pause 200/question fork0 "#It was probably just first-time nerves.#You can't give up on her so quickly."/pause 200/emote Marlon 40/pause 200/speak Marlon "I suppose you are correct.#$b#Could you go and find her?#$b#She may be more receptive to you than myself at the moment."/pause 200/emote farmer 56/pause 300/end/fade

Entries.262213015/e 262213014/f Abigail 2000: none/-1000 -1000/farmer -100 -100 0 Abigail 53 8 2/skippable/showFrame Abigail 53/viewport 53 8/fade/pause 300/warp farmer 54 5/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 100/move farmer 0 2 2/pause 100/shake Abigail 100/emote farmer 16/pause 100/move farmer 0 1 3/pause 200/emote farmer 40/pause 200/quickQuestion Abigail...#How are you feeling?#Wow, you took off like a bat! Haha(break)speak Abigail "Just fine, thanks.$5"(break)speak Abigail "Yeah, haha, totally...$2"/pause 200/emote farmer 28/pause 200/emote Abigail 40/pause 200/speak Abigail "...Sorry.$2"/playMusic desolate/pause 200/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 100/showFrame farmer 54/showFrame Abigail 25/pause 400/speak Abigail "I... I thought I was ready.$2#$b#Really, I did!$6#$b#But then I...$6#$b#I don't know.$2"/pause 400/speak Abigail "I got down the ladder with you, and everything felt okay.$2#$b#But then I heard those sounds.$2#$b#And suddenly, it was like the place was too cramped and dark.$2#$b#And my sword felt a lot heavier.$2"/pause 200/speak Abigail "I hope Marlon isn't disappointed in me.$2#$b#I just had to get out of there...$2"/pause 300/emote farmer 40/pause 300/speak Abigail "Maybe I'm just not cut out for this.$2#$b#What if this isn't what I want?$2"/pause 200/quickQuestion What do you think?#Do you really want to give up so easily?#It was pretty scary when I started out, it took a lot of practice to get used to.#That's possible, but can you really decide based on one incident?#Failure is how you learn.(break)speak Abigail "...$2#$b#Not yet.$6#$b#But I guess I'm still realizing what I'm up against.$2"(break)speak Abigail "You got scared too?$2#$b#I guess that's fair, you are from the city after all...$6"(break)speak Abigail "I guess you're right.$2#$b#I'm just still realizing what I'm up against.$2"(break)speak Abigail "Yeah, I guess thats true.$6"/pause 300/emote Abigail 40/pause 200/speak Abigail "I want to try again.$6"/pause 200/emote farmer 20/pause 200/speak Abigail "If anything happens, you'll keep me safe, right?$2"/pause 200/question fork0 "#You bet!#I promise.#Nothing will happen, don't worry.#Do or do not, there is no try."/pause 200/stopMusic/faceDirection Abigail 2/pause 200/speak Abigail "Alright.$6"/pause 200/faceDirection Abigail 0/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 200/speak Abigail "Let's go."/pause 300/end/fade
